name: Tetrominauts
description:
Tetrominauts is a Tetris-inspired game with a twist! 

Solve puzzles with tetrominoes and non-tetrominoes in space. Customize your gameplay experience with game speed, grid height and width.

🧱 Features

  • Gesture controls
  • Customizable gameplay
  • Light and night mode
  • Background animations
  • Space themed music

👾 Available block types

  • Single
  • Domino
  • Trominoes
  • Tetrominoes
  • Pentominoes

💖 Resource credits

  • Pupkin
  • hexadecimalwtf
  • Norma2D
  • yd
  • Kenney

PS: The name is a pun between astronaut and tetromi(nots). Neat!
